ICE's driver surveillance program, by the numbers:

-50 most populated cities searchable
-80 local agencies sharing driver locations w/ICE
-9000 agents w/system access

1105850089162063872.text: Think this doesn’t affect you? ICE can search for the locations of drivers – citizens AND noncitizens alike – in this database containing more than a billion location coordinates.
